scripts.build-all: npm run build-docs && npm run build-changelog
scripts.build-docs: npm run build-docs-v2 && npm run build-docs-v3
scripts.build-docs-v2: cd docs-v2 && bundle install && bundle exec middleman build --clean --verbose && mkdir -p ../build/v2 && cp -Rv build/ ../build/v2
scripts.build-docs-v3: cd docs-v3 && bundle install && bundle exec middleman build --clean --verbose && mkdir -p ../build/v3 && cp -Rv build/ ../build/v3
